title.description: Title of the project. E.g. the research project title, or GitHub project name.

body_text.description: The original text of the document

innovation_ranking.type: A score representing how 'innovative' the project is, between 0 (least innovative) and 1 (most innovative). This attribute is liable to change as more sophisticated project innovation metrics are developed.

pub_med_uids.description: Unique IDs associated with articles on PubMed.

source.description: The original data source for this project, e.g. 'WorldReport', 'GitHub'

institutions.description: All of the institutions mentioned in the body text of the project.

funder.description: The main funding body for the project as identified in the original data.

mesh_labels.description: The MeSH labels that have been associated with the body text of the project.
